title: Tuskegee Airmen National Historic Site: Blind / Low Vision
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility     Blind / Low Vision              Blind / Low Vision         Low Vision   Restrooms and some exhibits at the Tuskegee Airmen National Historic Site are labeled with tactile images and Braille text. Limited copies of the park brochure are available in Braille for the visually impaired. A copy may be requested in advance of your visit by contacting Ranger Christine Biggers at christine_biggers@nps.gov or 334-74-0922 or ask a Park Ranger upon arriving at Hangar #2.
